column3: na ɔbaa bokamba hɔn asaase do."
nna ohun dɛ
column4: bura bi wɔ haban no mu
column7: nguankuw ebiasa gugu ho wɔ hɔ; osiandɛ bura no no mu nsu na wɔsaw ma nguankuw no ma wɔnom: na ɔbo a ɔda bura no n’ano no so."

column2: "Na hɔ na nguankuw no nyinara wohyia: na sɛ wohyia a wopirew ɔbo no fi bura no n’ano
column3: na wɔma nguan no nsu ma wɔnom
column4: na wopirew ɔbo no hin bura no n’ano bio."

column3: Mo nuanom
column4: hom fi hen? Na wobuaa dɛ

column3: Ana hom nyim Nahor ne ba Laban a? Na wɔsee dɛ
column7: No ho ye? Na wɔsee dɛ
column10: ne babaa Rahel na ɔnye nguan reba yi."

column3: Hwɛ
column5: nkyii so aber a wɔka mbowa nnyae nndurii: hom mma nguan no nsu ma wɔnnom
column6: na hom nkɔ nkɛma hɔn edziban."

column3: Yennkotum
column4: gyedɛ wɔaboaboa nguankuw no nyinara ano
column5: na woepirew ɔbo efi bura no n’ano; ansaana yɛama nguan no nsu ma wɔaanom."

column2: "Na Jakob nye hɔn da ho rekasa no
column3: nna Rahel nye n’egya no nguan no bae: nna ɔno na ɔhwɛ hɔn."
aber a Jakob hun ne na no nua Laban ne babaa Rahel
column4: na ne na no nua Laban no nguan no
column6: na okepireew ɔbo no fii bura no n’ano
column7: na ɔmaa ne na no nua Laban no nguan no nsu ma wɔnomee."

column3: na ɔmaa ne ndze do
n’egya n’awɔfase nye no
column4: na ɔyɛ Rebeka ne ba: na Rahel tuu enguan na ɔkɛkaa kyerɛɛ n’egya."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Laban tsee n’akyerɛbaa ne ba Jakob ne nka no
column3: otutuu enguan kehyiaa no kwan
column6: na ɔdze no baa ne fie. Na ɔbɔɔ n’amandzɛɛ yi nyinara kyerɛɛ Laban."

column3: Ampaara
column4: eyɛ me biew nye mo honam. Na ɔtsenaa ne nkyɛn bosoom."

column3: Ana osiandɛ mo nua nye wo ntsi
column4: ebɔsom me kwa? Ka kyerɛ me

column2: "Na Laban wɔ mbabaa beenu: panyin dze no ne dzin dze Leah
column3: na ekumaba no ne dzin dze Rahel."

column2: "Na Leah n’enyiwa yɛ meamea; na Rahel dze no ho yɛ fɛw na n’enyim wɔ nyam."
"Na Jakob dɔɔ Rahel; na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Wo ba kuma Rahel ntsi mobɔsom wo mfe esuon."
Oye dɛ medze no mebɛma wo sen dɛ medze no mebɛma ɔbarimba bi: enye me ntsena."

column2: "Na Rahel ntsi Jakob soom mfe esuon; na ɔdɔ a ɔdɔ no ntsi
column3: ɔyɛɛ n’enyi do dɛ nda kumaabi."
Fa me yer ma me
na ɔtoo pon."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ anafua no ɔfaa ne babaa Leah
column3: na ɔdze no brɛɛ no; na ɔnye no dae"

column2: "Na Laban dze n’abaawa Zilpa maa ne babaa Leah abaawa."

column3: nna Jakob nkɔhwɛ a saana Leah a: na obisaa Laban dɛ
column4: Ebɛnadze na ayɛ me yi? Nnyɛ Rahel ntsi na mosoom wo bi? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi mbɔ na adaadaa me yi?"

column3: Hɛn ha wɔnnyɛ no dɛm; wɔmmfa ekumaba no mma awar ana wɔdze abakan no ama."
na yɛdze ɔno so bɛma wo wɔ ɔsom a ebɔsom me mfe esuon fofor bio ntsi."
na ɔmaa ne dapɛn kor soe: na ɔdze ne babaa Rahel so maa no awar."

column2: "Na Laban dze n’abaawa Bilha maa ne babaa Rahel dɛ abaawa."
"Na Jakob kɔr Rahel so nkyɛn nye no dae
column3: na ɔdɔɔ Rahel seen Leah
column4: na ɔsoom Laban mfe esuon fofor bio."

column2: "Na EWURADZE hun dɛ wɔtan Leah no
column3: obuee n’awoo kwan: na Rahel dze nna ɔbɔnyin a."
na ɔwoo babanyin
column4: na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Reuben a asekyerɛ nye; Monhwɛ ɔbabanyin: na ɔsee dɛ
column5: EWURADZE ahwɛ m’amandzehu; na afei dze mo kun bɔdɔ me."

column3: na ɔwoo babanyin; na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Osiandɛ EWURADZE atse dɛ wɔtan me ntsi
column5: na ɔdze ɔba yi so ama me: na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Simeon a asekyerɛ nye; Otsie."

column3: na ɔwoo babanyin; na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Afei na mo kun nye me bɛka
column5: osiandɛ mawo mbabanyin baasa ama no: dɛm ntsi wɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Levi asekyerɛ nye; Ahofam."

column3: na ɔwoo babanyin: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Afei mibeyi EWURADZE ayɛw: dɛm ntsi ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Juda; a asekyerɛ nye; Ayɛyi na ogyaa awoo."
